titleStmt.title: Certaine new inventions and profitable experiments necessary to be known of all farmers, and others, that endeavour to procure benefit to themselves, and plentie to the commonwealth.
titleStmt.author: Plattes, Gabriel, fl. 1638-1640.

titleStmt.title: Certaine new inventions and profitable experiments necessary to be known of all farmers, and others, that endeavour to procure benefit to themselves, and plentie to the commonwealth.
titleStmt.author: Plattes, Gabriel, fl. 1638-1640.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gabriel Plattes by STC (2nd ed.); ms. notes at foot of sheet name "Gabriell Plattes" as the inventor of the devices described.
Advertising a new invention for planting corn, beans, and peas.
Reproduction of original in: Massachusetts Historical Society.
